Texts.Chs:
联盟曾多次向RS341023系统发送其他侦察型混编舰队，但没有人发现航海家旅团的踪影。

“航海家”的目标行星RS341023-02被发现虽然能够居住，但环境恶劣。 在那里联盟建立了一个小哨所，期盼着航海家旅团有一天能够抵达，但几百年来，希望开始消失了。
Texts.Eng:
Additional scouting flotillas have been sent to the RS341023 system on multiple occasions, but none have ever found a trace of the Voyager Company.

The Voyager's target planet - RS341023-02 - was found to be habitable, but it presented a harsh environment. A small outpost has been set up there in the hopes that the Voyager Company would one day arrive, but after hundreds of years, hope has started to fade.

Texts.Chs: 航海家旅团失踪之谜的介绍
Texts.Eng: An introduction to the mystery of the lost Voyager Company.

Texts.Chs:
最后一个侦察任务被部署，内容是追踪航海家旅团从地球到RS341023-02的路线，但再也没有发现舰队的踪迹。

直到今天，航海家旅团的损失仍然是埃癸人联盟有史以来最大的未解之谜之一。
Texts.Eng:
One final scouting mission was deployed, tasked with retracing the path of the Voyager Company from Earth to RS341023-02, but again no traces of the fleet were found.

To this day, the loss of the Voyager Company remains one of the largest unsolved mysteries in the Aeginian Federal Union.

Texts.Chs:
航海家旅团在发射时损失了两艘船：由于建造匆忙不慎，这两艘船均因此发生了故障。 不幸的是，这些船上的所有2000名灵魂都罹难而去了，但他们将被永远铭记在心。

幸存的19艘船成功逃离地球，并与耐力公司一同前往太阳系的边缘。 在该星系边际，两支舰队分道扬镳，都朝着有希望成为人类新家的方向前进。
Texts.Eng:
The Voyager Company lost two ships on launch: both suffered a malfunction as a result of the rushed development of the ships. All 2000 souls on board these ships were unfortunately lost, but they will forever be remembered.

The surviving 19 ships successfully fled the Earth, and traveled to the edge of the Sol System alongside the Endurance Company. At the edge of the system, the two fleets parted ways, both heading to what was hoped to be a new home for humanity.

Texts.Chs: 航海家旅团为RS341023系统设定了路线，据信该系统是宜居星球RS341023-02的所在地。 恒心旅团和航海家旅团每天进行交流，分享他们的旅程和基因改造计划的进展。 但是大约六年后，两支舰队之间的所有通讯突然中断了。
Texts.Eng: The Voyager Company set course for the RS341023 system, which was believed to be home to a habitable planet, RS341023-02. The Endurance and Voyager Companies communicated on a daily basis, sharing progress on their journeys and their genetic modification programs. After approximately six years, however, all communications between the two fleets abruptly ended.

Texts.Chs: 没有明显的冲突或事故迹象，直到今天，在航海家旅团身上发生的事件还是未知的。 在“恒心”旅程的剩余239年中，它试图与其姊妹舰队重新建立通信，但无济于事。 在48 AA，恒心旅团（现在所熟知的埃癸人）的定居者派出了一支侦察舰队来探索RS341023系统，但没有发现航海家旅团的到访迹象（原定于22 AA到达该系统）
Texts.Eng: There were no clear signs of a conflict or accident, and to this day, what happened to the Voyager Company is unknown. For the remaining 239 years of the Endurance's journey, it attempted to re-establish communications with its sister fleet, but to no avail. In 48 AA, the settlers of the Endurance Company - now known as the Aegi - sent out a scouting flotilla to investigate the RS341023 system, but it found no signs of the Voyager Company (which was meant to arrive in the system in 22 AA).

Texts.Chs:
^orange;介绍^reset;

这是对久违的航海家旅团之谜的简短介绍，航海家旅团是为将人类运送到新世界而建造的两支舰队之一。 该摘要由克里昂大学文学教授海德家 的 埃娜撰写。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Introduction^reset;

This is a short introduction to the mystery of the long-lost Voyager Company, one of the two fleets that were built to carry mankind to a new home. This summary was written by Aena of Hythe, literary professor at the University of Creon.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;航海家旅团^reset;

航海家旅团是由21艘宇宙飞船组成的舰队，是“出埃及行动”的一部分：这是为拯救人类免于灭绝而进行的最后努力。 在246 BA，就在小行星撞击地表的前一天，航海家旅团与恒心旅团数目相同的21艘船一起发射了。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;The Voyager Company^reset;

The Voyager Company was a fleet of 21 spaceships built by mankind as part of Operation Exodus: a last-ditch effort to save humanity from potential extinction. In 246 BA, only a day before Earth was hit by a massive asteroid, the Voyager Company launched its 21 ships alongside the 21 ships of the Endurance Company.
